mysql.query: SELECT campaign.created_dt utc, service.uuid service, count(*) value FROM news.news_campaign campaign LEFT JOIN news.news_service service ON campaign.service_id = service.id GROUP BY service, date(utc), hour(utc) ORDER BY campaign.id LIMIT %s OFFSET %s

SELECT sms.created_dt utc, service.uuid service, campaign_id campaign, message_type type, sms.status status, count(*) value FROM news.news_message_sms sms LEFT JOIN news.news_service service ON sms.service_id = service.id GROUP BY service, campaign, type, status, date(utc), hour(utc) ORDER BY sms.id LIMIT %s OFFSET %s

SELECT contact.created_dt utc, service.uuid service, list_id list, count(*) value FROM news.cds_contact contact LEFT JOIN news.news_service service ON contact.service_id = service.id GROUP BY service, list, date(utc), hour(utc) ORDER BY contact.id LIMIT %s OFFSET %s

SELECT news.cds_list.id id, news.cds_list.created_dt utc, news.news_service.uuid service, count(*) value FROM news.cds_list LEFT JOIN news.news_service ON news.cds_list.service_id=news.news_service.id GROUP BY service, date(utc), hour(utc) ORDER BY id LIMIT %s OFFSET %s
